bug.short_desc: excessive memory allocation of koji download-build

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: It looks like koji tries to put all the downloaded data into memory before processing them, which makes it impossible to download huge RPMs on hosts with limited amount of memory.
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): koji-1.9.0-15.fc21.noarch
How reproducible: 100%
Steps to Reproduce: 1. koji download-build --arch=noarch alienarena-7.66-5.fc22
Actual results: Memory consumption continuously grows as data is transferred.
Expected results: Memory consumption is constant during the data transfer.
Additional info: /usr/bin/urlgrabber does not suffer from this bug.
